scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server --prefix api" "npm run start:dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix api && npm run build:prod --prefix client
scripts.prod: concurrently "npm run prod --prefix api" "npm run server:prod --prefix client"
scripts.dev-webhook: concurrently "npm run server --prefix api" "npm run start:dev --prefix client" "npm run webhook"
